summary: After a death in the family turns his world upside down, an introverted young novelist struggles to maintain his relationship with his successful girlfriend.
cast: Tijn Docter|Carice van Houten|Catherine ten Bruggencate|Karina Smulders|Maartje Remmers|Halina Reijn|Tygo Gernandt|Johnny de Mol|Maaike Neuville|Tjebbo Gerritsma|Jaap Spijkers|Sylvia Poorta|Rick Nicolet|Mark Rietman|Han Kerckhoffs|Kees Boot|Lukas Dijkema|Barry Atsma|Arjan ten Broecke|Phillip Merillo|Francisco Rodriquez|Carlos Vico|Catarina Costa|Rebecca Hanser
director: Director: Willem van de Sande Bakhuyzen
title: Ik omhels je met 1000 armen
